scripts.dev: bash -c ". ./graphile-starter-app/.env && cd .devcontainer && yarn devcontainer:up && yarn devcontainer:dev "
scripts.devcontainer: bash -c ". ./graphile-starter-app/.env && cd .devcontainer && yarn devcontainer:up && yarn docker-attach-dev bash "
scripts.docker-exec-dev: docker-compose -f ./.devcontainer/docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f ./.devcontainer/docker-compose.yml up -d dev && docker-compose -f ./.devcontainer/docker-compose.yml exec dev
